All Classes

Class
Description
AbstractDisplay
This class provides common implementation code for drawing objects.
AbstractGrid<E>
AbstractGrid contains the methods that are common to grid implementations.
ActorWorld
An ActorWorld is occupied by actors.
Beacon
 
BlockedLocation
 
Bot
Rats are the competitors in the RatBots game.
BotBrain
A BotBrain is the 'brain' for a Bot in the BotWorld.
BotWorld
A RatBotWorld is full of RatBotActors used in the game RatBots.
BotWorldRunner
 
ColorEditor
A property editor for the Color type.
DefaultDisplay
The DefaultDisplay draws the object's text property with a background color given by the object's color property.
Display
The Display interface contains the method needed to display a grid object.
DisplayMap
DisplayMap is a collection that maps grid occupant classes to objects that know how to display them.
FormLayout
A layout manager that lays out components along a central axis
This code is not tested on the AP CS A and AB exams.
GameObject
A GameObject is an entity with a color and direction that can act.
Grid<E>
Grid provides an interface for a two-dimensional, grid-like environment containing arbitrary objects.
GridSpace
This is just a collection class to link walls with grid spaces.
ImageDisplay
An ImageDisplay displays an object as a tinted image from an image file whose name matches the class name.
Location
A Location object represents the row and column of a location in a two-dimensional grid.
LocationEditor
A property editor for the Location type.
MenuMaker<T>
Makes the menus for constructing new occupants and grids, and for invoking methods on existing occupants.
MinerBot
 
PAClassLoader
 
PAFileUtil
 
PAGuiUtil
 
Paper
 
PaperWinner
PaperBoy acts like MinerBot until 20 rocks, Then goes to middle and bids on Papers (bid is 1 each time)
RandomMover
 
RatBotManager
 
RatBotsArena
The Arena class includes all of the methods needed to setup the arena according to the rules of the game.
RatBotsColorAssigner
The ColorAssigner class is a utility that keeps track of colors used in the game.
RatBotsColorScheme
 
RatBotsGrid<E>
A RatBotsGrid is a rectangular grid with a finite number of rows and columns.
RatBotsGridPanel
A GridPanel is a panel containing a graphical display of the grid occupants.
RatBotsGUIController<T>
The GUIController controls the behavior in a WorldFrame.
RatBotsScoreBoard
 
RatBotsWorldFrame<T>
The WorldFrame displays a World and allows manipulation of its occupants.
Rock
 
Scissors
Scissors dart around, only changing direction when they are unable to move forward.
ScissorsTracker
 
ScoringNotification
 
Trail
 
Wall
 
World<T>
A World is the mediator between a grid and the GridWorld GUI.
